column4: No ATI graphics driver is installed, or the ATI driver is not functioning properly.
Please install the ATI driver appropriate for you ATI hardware, or configure using aticonfig
im pretty sure all the ati drivers are installed
i havent installed the proprietary driver
what's the driver on your xorg.conf say?
type modeprobe fglrx, and tell us what it says
